pr_title: TSK-1390: Add SPI to allow task processing before creation

timeline.message: TSK-1390: Add SPI to allow task processing before creation

timeline.bodyText: Why did you put it here? I would have expected it even before the opening of the connection to the database...
timeline.author: holgerhagen

replies.bodyText: I wasn't sure if the workbasket/summary would definately never be needed in the SPI method....changed it to before opening the connection of the database now
replies.author: gitgoodjhe

timeline.bodyText:
I would prefer the more simple package pro.taskana.spi.task.
And do we really need ".api"? Isn't SPI already enough?
timeline.author: holgerhagen

replies.bodyText: changed the package to pro.taskana.spi.task. api/internal packages to be consistent with history and task trouting spis. Do you want all of them restructured to without api/internal packages?
replies.author: gitgoodjhe
